column4: Technically, Gnome is several programs. There is a program that draws the panels, a program that draws the background, and so on.
An X client is merely any program making use of the GUI.
Some of which are part of Gnome.

yes, i realize that, flannel seems to be suggesting something different, so I am seeking clarification (I use x clients on a remote x server on a daily basis, so i'm looking for some clarification here)
